p: Are you a Data Analyst? Have you always been interested in working within Higher Education? Would you be excited at the prospect of empowering some of the country=E2=80=99s top Universities to build a brighter future for the students of today? If so, this may be the role you have been looking for=E2=80=A6
p.2: This business is looking for a Data Analyst to work closely with client partners to understand their analytical needs, evaluate key performance metrics, and analyze trends. This role would be suited to someone who enjoys the communication side of Data! At this time this role is only open to US Citizens / Green card holders and the role will be largely remote with 2 days a month required in the office.

li: Bachelor=E2=80=99s degree from an accredited institution of higher learning with 2 years or more of work experience.
li.1: Excellent communication skills and experience presenting findings to mid to senior-level executives.
li.2: Expertise leveraging SQL, Excel, and data visualization tools such as Tableau to manipulate, analyze and present data.
li.3: Knowledge of SQL, R/ Python queries to build reports and conduct advanced quantitative analysis.

p.7: The responsibilities of the Data Analyst will be:

li: Develop subject matter expertise in the businesses data platform and guide client partners in the use of the platform to answer strategic institutional questions.
li.1: Perform ad hoc analyses to discover actionable information in support of strategic decision making.
li.2: Leverage enterprise business intelligence tools, SQL queries, and other tools to develop complex dashboards and reports.
li.3: Translate and interpret business and data requirements between the client and the businesses technical/data teams.

p.10: So if you are a Data Analyst and have been looking for a new position, or this role simply caught your eye, please do apply today or contact me directly at max.morrell@elsdonconsulting.com
